name: Phantom Seeds
description:
Une is your average village girl. Her life changes after her father found a young boy named Yun and adopted him. Une is happy for having a little brother, but that happiness is short-lived. The villagers believe that Yun is responsible for many calamities in the village. Une does not want to believe that, but she cannot deny that Yun is indeed a boy with many mysteries.
